cast.name: 德芬·卡亚拉尔 Defne Kayalar
厄内尔·埃尔坎 Öner Erkan

awards:
第35届东京国际电影节(2022)
　　亚洲未来单元 最佳影片(提名) 梅丽莎·厄内尔

writer.name: 梅丽莎·厄内尔 Melisa Önel

director.name: 梅丽莎·厄内尔 Melisa Önel

introduction: After decades of living in Hamburg, Reyhan returns to İstanbul with her husband for a short while. On the eve of her return, she realizes that her sense of smell has gone. When a doctor’s appointment leaves her anxious about the possibility of a serious illness, she decides to follow her instincts to regain her sense of smell instead of undergoing more tests. To establish a new bond with life, Reyhan chooses to leave everything behind. She vanishes, secretly moves into her late grandmother’s flat, gets a random job at a hotel, and meets a blind man. Just as she assumes a new life seems possible, she realizes she has become a missing person. She considers this her chance for freedom.源自：https://www.antalyaff.com/en/movies/nationalfeaturefilm/23/316
